how_to_use: Apply nightly before bedtime to clean, dry skin. Use alone or over your favorite serum.

reviews.headline: My favorite night cream EVER
reviews.comments: The holy grail when it comes to night creams! I have relatively oily skin, also gets dry during the winter months. I love how soft it leaves my skin feeling in the morning, and doesn't irritate my skin or make my acne worse. Also doesn't enlarge my pores which is a bonus! I actually tried out this product for the first time a year ago, once I ran out I ended up trying another night cream which was just OK, and returned back to this product -- I don't think I'll ever try another night cream again, this is the winner!

reviews.headline: Does exactly what I want it to do
reviews.comments: I was on the hunt for a night cream that wasn't trying to do too much. I'm already using retinol, peptide, and vitamin c serums, so I just needed a thick moisturizer at night. While the price tag is a little steep, it's really good and I wake up with hydrated skin. It also lasts a good while.

reviews.headline: Not as moisturizing as claimed
reviews.comments: This winter, my forehead is the driest it has ever been and I was on the hunt for a very moisturizing night cream. I saw this and thought it would be perfect since Ive heard great reviews on the basic ultra repair cream, and this night cream even has a scale with a cactus on it meaning it is good for very dry skin. Ive been using it for over a month now and honestly, my forehead has only gotten drier. It is super flaky and rough, and I put on a decent amount of this night cream, but I still wake up every morning with dry skin. Im going to finish the container since it is expensive and it does come with a lot of product, but it definitely is not for dry skin like it advertises.

reviews.headline: Smooth
reviews.comments: I love wearing this before i go to bed. This product leaves my face smooth and moisturized. Definitely will keep buying it.

reviews.headline: Smooth
reviews.comments: I love wearing this before i go to bed. This product leaves my face smooth and moisturized. Definitely will keep buying it.

reviews.headline: Wonderful for sensitive skin
reviews.comments: I randomly decided to try this night cream and I absolutely love it. I have very sensitive, rosacea skin and my skin loves this i feel so hydrated and its not breaking me out.

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: I use with retina subscription and it works well to keep my skin hydrated

reviews.headline: FAB Night Cream
reviews.comments: Great for Uber sensitive skin!  I use it daily morning & night time. Eyelids & lips were often in crisis before I started using this exclusively.

reviews.headline: wanted to love it
reviews.comments: I ordered this because I find the daytime normal moisturizer from FAB to be too light for me at night. honestly, this one barely moisturizes me any more and it's a lot more pricey. I have dry skin and I feel just barely hydrated about 1-2 minutes after putting this on, and then ten minutes later my skin feels dry as heck again. not for me.

reviews.headline: made my skin patchy dry
reviews.comments: Usually most products work on my skin. I'm not one of those sensitive people at all. However after using this for 10 nights as a night cream,  this one weirdly caused me to have patches of dry skin around my cheeks and jaw line. I liked how thick the cream is but it didn't work for me. This is the first time I'll be returning a skin care product.  Guess I'll be going back to my Kielhs night cream instead.

reviews.headline: Love!
reviews.comments: My skin has been super dry and flakey this winter, no serums or other moisturizers seemed to help. I tried this and my skin drank it in, it felt immediately quenched, and the next day felt supple and glowy. Fragrance free too- win!

reviews.headline: love it
reviews.comments: I have really picky/sensitive combination skin. I use this at night after using the cleanser before bed and it makes my face so soft!

reviews.headline: Recommend
reviews.comments: I'm very particular about products. This was perfect for me at nighttime. It offers great hydration without any perfume.

reviews.headline: Great night time moisturizer, even for combo skin
reviews.comments: I have combination, acne-prone skin and I live in a humid city. It is definitely a nighttime product- unless you have the driest skin this will be too heavy for day use. I have been using it for a week now and haven't noticed any new breakouts, and my skin is so soft when I wake up. It is super hydrating but doesn't feel occlusive.  A little goes a looong way so the price is justifiable to me, though it is more than I imagined spending on a moisturizer. I also love that it doesn't have a scent to it.

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: I truly love this cream, I don't often write reviews but I am helping a friend build her routine and I suggested this to her so decided I should also write a review while I am at it. I leaves my skin moisturized but not greasy, I have combo to normal skin depending on the season. My skin feels glorious every morning after using this.

reviews.headline: clogged pores
reviews.comments: It clogged my pores and made me feel greasy in the a.m. used it for a few weeks thinking it was something out and I lost the clear skin I worked so hard for trying something new. I have skin more on the oily side. I wanted to like it but it isn't for me.

reviews.headline: Caused breakouts
reviews.comments: I found this made me break out around my nose and chin.

reviews.headline: LOOOVE IT
reviews.comments: Wonderful product! Feels great on my face and 'soaks' in so nicely, not sticky or greasy feeling. Wake up with refreshed, smooth and hydrated skin!

reviews.headline: Soft!
reviews.comments: Just received so I can't say too much yet other than it makes my face feel super soft. It only takes a small amount to get a whole lot of moisture. So far so good!

reviews.headline: The Perfect Moisturizer For Dry Skin
reviews.comments: i have tried so many moisturizers for my dry peeling skin. i had yet to find one that i didnt have to keep reapplying over and over or one that would leave me with little white blisters or sebatious filaments. but this is my holy grail it absolutely does not clog my pores, can use a mi imal amount and youre good all night or day. i use this both day and night even though it is a "night cream". so perfect

properties.name: Pros

values.label: Great for sensitive skin, healing, moisturizing

display_values: Great for sensitive skin, healing, moisturizing

faceoff_positive.comments: I have extremely sensitive, blemish prone skin that is oily and dry (flaky and oily - yay!). I was pretty skeptical that any moisturizer would work with my skin rather than making me break out in pimples and oil slicks - I'm glad tried this anyway. I've been using it for three months and my skin has never looked better. I use the cleanser first, then follow it with this moisturizer and my skin looks good and feels good. My blemishes are pretty much gone and my skin isn't dry anymore, and the oiliness has gone down significantly. I highly recommend this stuff (and really, really hope that FAB never stops making their products).
faceoff_positive.headline: LOVE this stuff

faceoff_negative.comments: Bought this product after loving the Ultra Repair Cream. I put this on after cleansing my face and my skin immediately started to turn red and itchy. I thought this initial reaction might subside, so I tried to keep the moisturizer on my face for a little bit. After 5 minutes, my face was starting to develop hives. I immediately scrubbed my face and returned to my normal moisturizer. I am so disappointed- I love the Ultra Repair Cream so much and I thought this would be an extension of that. Sadly can't use this product. I am surprised because FAB's skincare is normally very gentle and formulated with clean ingredients- I don't know why I reacted so poorly to this product :(
faceoff_negative.headline: caused me to break out in hives
